title: Process an Employee Promotion
description: A manager wants to promote a direct report, which includes a title change and a salary increase.

tasks.description: Receive the promotion request from the manager, including the new title and proposed salary.
Review the proposed salary against the company's compensation bands for the new role to ensure equity.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP confirms the proposed salary is within the approved range.

tasks.description: Process the promotion in the HRIS, updating the employee's title, salary, and reporting structure, effective on the specified date.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP successfully updates the employee's record with all the promotion details.
